thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 4 of 65
thread.title: Tessie

author: Tessie
title: Tessie
text: Chelsea was great at helping us plan our Mexico trip with another couple. She was very patient with me when we kept going back and forth on the day we want to go. When asking if we were getting the best rates possible she made sure to check. She was able to lower the price and get an even better deal for us. I'm completely satisfied with my services through apple vacations in the booking process.
